creator: phil@glatz.com
text:
using  FreeBSD 2.2.2-RELEASE, configure craps out:

./configure --prefix=/usr/local/apache
Configuring for Apache, Version 1.3.24
 + using installation path layout: Apache (config.layout)
Creating Makefile
Creating Configuration.apaci in src
./configure: 3: Bad file descriptor
[: syntax error

creator: slive@apache.org
text: Please don't submit a bug report and post to the mailing list at the same time.
